text:
We’re at the HNZ helicopter training school
here in Penticton British Columbia

and we are going to go up on a helicopter
ride today

and learn a little geology
and go for a little hike
it’ll be a lot of fun
And we’re left all alone on the mountain
Ladies and gentlemen I give you the Okanagan Valley

Alright that was a great tour over the
Okanagan Valley

When you come to Penticton
make sure you do it!
